metadata.name: Kuulorful Squiggles
metadata.description:
Day 1 'Kuulorful Squiggles' by [KuuPottery](https://www.kuupottery.com)

A wheel thrown chalice in white matte with hand painted squiggles in orange, chartreuse, and royal blue.


Vase size is approximately

6.5 inches tall, 6 inches wide with handles, and a 3.5 inch opening
